name: Delivery, deposit, and acceptance prohibition
text: [§342L-32.5]  Delivery, deposit, and acceptance prohibition.  No person shall deliver to, deposit into, or accept a regulated substance into an underground storage tank regulated under this chapter at a facility that has been identified by the department to be ineligible for such delivery, deposit, or acceptance.  The delivery prohibition may go into effect at a facility before a hearing is conducted by the director. [L 2009, c 7, §2]
